about.name: Climate Neutral Blockchain Group
about.description_short: Let's make Cardano the most climate neutral blockchain technology of the world
about.description_long: Cardano Climate Neutral Blockchain Group is an alliance of Stakepool Operators with the common goal to make Cardano the most eco-friendly and climate neutral blockchain. Members of this group have committed to 1. use only 100% renewable energy for the operation of their stakepool servers 2. donate from their pool fees to climate protection activities or compensation measures.
